document_data.name: Jochris
document_data.mainbody: '''Jochris''' was the headmaster of the [[Neverwinter Academy]] around [[1374 DR]].
document_data.History: After [[Qara]]'s fight with [[Ashni]], with the [[Kalach-Cha]] and companions, Jochris would approach Qara. Seeing his students being hurt by Qara, Jochris summoned [[Sydney Natale]] to his quarters, as he wanted revenge on Qara. After a while, Jochris gave Sydney some thread from Qara's robe and some of her hair, as well as his blood, to power a ritual. Sydney summoned an [[animus elemental]], which would track Qara and attack her.<ref>
